name: You Go Up, Things Go Down!
name_original: You Go Up, Things Go Down!
description:
This is my first entry into a Ludum Dare event. I've always wanted to take part in one and this was the perfect opportunity seen as this project can also contribute towards my university work. The game is simple, you attempt to go as high as possible, but to do so you must throw items overboard to keep going. Be careful though, you may need some of those items on your journey upwards.

Click items to equip them.

To use fuel, click on the balloon.

To use rocks, click on the birds/planes.

To gain speed, click on the sky with any item in hand.
